name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DMS DEPLOY UTILITIES - DMS EXTENSION SERIES

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will simplify your deploy usage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension has been made by DMS  tech team which provide some front end features for our company workers that they might needed it ,. 
The extension provide two parts of features :
 


Deploy features : 

 
- Two buttons for each tag the first one provide you the ability to remove that specific tag and  
  
   the second one give the ability to reset the value of that specific tab 

- A button that give you the ability to copy the selected offer directly from the deploy interface 

- A big large button that open the PMTA Modal pop up 

- Auto select servers and queues 

- Email Saver Feature where you  can save your most used emails and then importing it in any inputs  using alt+G 


- Keyboard shortcuts to select PMTA commands faster without having the need of a mouse 

To open the run command modal click : alt + p
To unselect all commands press :     Delete
To execute comnds press :                 Enter
For reset command press :                 0
For resume command press :             r
For delete command press :               d
For pause command press :               p
For schedule command press :          s


- Full control of the features : you can choose which feature you want to use and disable the one you don't want to 

- Email saver  : this feature give the ability to save your emails and  importing them with only clicking Alt + G  on any input 

- Complaint saviour : this feature will save you from making a bad send by giving the extension the name of your tag , and the extension will watch the state of those tags 




Outside features  which provides : 

- Domain TXT record checker ,

- Fast deploy Re-directer [Test - Send],

- Domains remover [Tool that remove all the domains from a given text] ,

- IPs fetcher  [Tool that fetch all the correct IPs from a given text] ,

- Memo Tool  where you can save anything you need as a text
